title: illaoi is super broken
body: the game was only shortly into it and illaoi took down three champs with only using her ult and reg atk I find this messed up that she just has to increase her atk just a little and can pawn any tank or champ there is with little to no effort it makes any moron that uses illaoi a god. she has way to much hp and def for a champ that can summon 4 tentacles at once and hit you 5 times in the chance you get one out. ganking her is impossible, if any champ that is squishy they die so fast you might get half hp then she does that shield skill and raises to completely full hp bar. I use darius and I had 270 phy def and yet she was eating away at my hp like it was nothing.

replies.body:
**On mobile and didn't feel like taking off caps. **

So here. KITE HER. KITE HER. KITE HER. KITE HER. 

IF SHE JUMPS IN THE AIR CC/RUN FROM HER.  

HER BIGGEST COUNTER IS LITERALLY RUNNING AWAY. 

SHE DOESNT HAVE A SHIELD SKILL SHE JUST HAS TONS OF HP REGEN PER TENTACLE SMACK WHICH CAN BE AVOIDED BY RUNNING AWAY

EDIT:This is coming from someone who used to main her. She's strong.. HELLA strong and Her skill floor is hella low so it's not hard to pick her up, but she literally has nothing to catch you and fuck your face unless you let her walk up to you and you face tank her W and tentacles.

The ONLY counterplay to Illaoi is to run away.  That, in my book, makes her broken.  And kiting isn't really viable for most top laners...unless you pick after the other team has an Illaoi, what can you do but try not to feed?

> [{quoted}](name=Kinetika,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=uk59Q8ih,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2016-07-27T21:38:57.012+0000)

> The ONLY counterplay to Illaoi is to run away.  That, in my book, makes her broken.  And kiting isn't really viable for most top laners...unless you pick after the other team has an Illaoi, what can you do but try not to feed?

Run away/CC/Poke/dodging. 
She is the classic slow and lumbering miniboss. She hits like a truck but moves as slow as molasses. 
She's easy to predict, she has Large indicators of her abilities. She goes to slap you? Sidestep and punish her, her main damage is tentacles. Don't be aggressive towards a illaoi in lane. Freeze lane near your tower so she's vulnerable to ganks. 
She fucks most top landers but only if you are aggressive leave her to the midlane/adc

Come team fights save some form of cc for her ultimate. Expect her to wipe your entire team if you group up and she gets a five man ult+soul

You have to play around her and just pay attention to her it's obvious. You grouped up? Here comes ult. She walks up? She's gonna E. If you're squishy and illaoi is close enough to W you.. You messed up somewhere.

Those are all valid points, but they all revolve around the same basic principle - using CC to run away, poke so you can run away (and poke isn't available on all champs).  But none of them are truly counterplay.  They're just variations on running away and hoping you don't get smashed with 3 tentacles at once.
I mean if you want to ignore everything people say and just cry, go ahead. But then stop trying to ask for a discussion if it's just going to be you whining.

First, I didn't ask for a discussion.  I contributed to one.  And my opinion is different than yours, so like most internet trolls, your method of "winning" is to try to call my opinion invalid because you don't agree with it.  

Second, imagine how many f*cks I give about you and your opinion (hint: zero).  

But seriously let me know if you have a position other than "Illaoi isn't OP because I say so".  Until then, my position is "Illaoi IS OP because I say so".

I mean, I have offered various reasons, along with this Shyvana person here, as to why she's not OP.
But I mean if you want to ignore everything that doesn't fit your narrow-minded salty point of view, go for it.
But then don't bother taking part in a discussion, since that's not the point.
Wow, you're sooo tough, you don't care about my opinion, sooo cool- oh wait, I don't care.
